com.informatica.mdm.bpm.idd

Class IDDTaskType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informatica.mdm.bpm.idd.IDDTaskType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITaskType

    public class IDDTaskType
extends Object
implements ITaskType
    Represents a task type in the IDD. Each task type in IDD has list of possible actions that is provided by the external BPM engine.
